aiContext.summary: Sahil Chudasama is an experienced Flutter developer specializing in cross-platform mobile app development with AI integrations, subscription systems, and Firebase backends. He has worked at Qurious Click and Wappnet Systems, building production apps with thousands of users. He is skilled in state management, clean architecture, in-app purchases, and modern development tools.
expertise: Building cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter for Android, iOS, and Windows
Implementing subscription models and in-app purchases using Stripe
Integrating AI-powered features like chatbots and ML models
Architecting scalable Firebase backends with Authentication, Firestore, and Cloud Functions
Creating responsive, pixel-perfect UIs with excellent UX
Using low-code/AI-assisted tools like FlutterFlow and Google Stitch
Team collaboration and agile development practices
